GSD.description:
block, bfq: don't move oom_bfqq

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit 7507ead1e9d42957c2340f2c4a0e9d00034e3366. For more details please see the references link.
